titleStmt.title: A True and perfect relation of the barbarous and cruell passages of the King's Army, at old Brainceford, neer London being presented to the House of Commons, by a committee of the same house, who was sent thither, on purpose to examine the truth of the particular actions of the said army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for E. Husbands and F. Frank ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
